channel.title: Is it possible to change the name of an item?
channel.description:
The dharoks great axe was called "3dharok great axe"
I removed the "3" in the beginning in item.cfg and then when I logged on to server it was called only a "dharok great axe"
I thought... If i can change the name of the dharoks great axe....
...I can change the name of the ogre comp bow to "dark_bow"
well... It didnt work. Is this even possible? And if not why was I able to change the dharok gr8 axe then?

item.title: Is it possible to change the name of an item?
item.dc:creator: @dragster32 dragster32
item.description:
@dragster32 wrote:

The dharoks great axe was called “3dharok great axe”

I removed the “3” in the beginning in item.cfg and then when I logged on to server it was called only a “dharok great axe”

I thought… If i can change the name of the dharoks great axe…

…I can change the name of the ogre comp bow to “dark_bow”

well… It didnt work. Is this even possible? And if not why was I able to change the dharok gr8 axe then?

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to change the name of an item?
